keyFactors.title: Elite Passing Volume
keyFactors.description: Love averaged 267.3 passing YPG entering Week 11, well above the 225.5 line. Top-10 QB in pass attempts per game (37.4).

keyFactors.title: Jaelan Phillips Trade Impact
keyFactors.description: Eagles acquired Phillips from Miami at deadline but expected integration time. Green Bay offensive line ranked 8th in pass protection.

keyFactors.title: Monday Night Shootout Potential
keyFactors.description: Primetime game between 6-3 Eagles and 5-4 Packers suggested high-scoring affair. Over/under at 45.5 points indicated offensive opportunities.

riskFactors: Cold weather at Lambeau Field could impact passing efficiency
Eagles' defensive front ranked 5th in QB pressures
Potential for run-heavy game script in frigid conditions

quarterBreakdown.description: DISASTER. Love posted just 20 net passing yards in scoreless first half. Jaelan Phillips (7 pressures in Eagles debut) and Jalyx Hunt (11-yard sack on opening drive) dominated. Averaged 2.2 YPA in H1.
Slight improvement but still limited. Love added 68 yards on 12 attempts. Eagles' pass rush continued generating pressure (3 sacks total for game). Still 0-0 entering Q4.
Green Bay's only scoring drive featured 88 passing yards. Love finished 20/36 for 176 yards total. Fumbled before halftime (Nakobe Dean forced, Phillips recovered) when in FG range. Never got rhythm.

gameResults.whenMissed: Never approached line - finished 49.5 yards short at 176
gameResults.gamePace: First scoreless-at-halftime NFL game since December 2023. Defensive slugfest (10-7 final) with frigid temps and relentless Eagles pass rush. Green Bay prioritized run game (27 rush attempts).

whatWentWrong.title: Jaelan Phillips Dominated
whatWentWrong.description: Phillips' Eagles debut was spectacular - 7 QB pressures, recovered fumble, constant disruption. The trade acquisition had immediate impact despite integration concerns.

whatWentWrong.title: 20 First-Half Passing Yards
whatWentWrong.description: Love posted just 20 net yards in scoreless first half. Averaged 2.2 YPA through two quarters as Eagles' front seven completely shut down passing attack.

whatWentWrong.title: Run-Heavy Game Script
whatWentWrong.description: Packers attempted only 36 passes vs 27 rushes in defensive struggle. Cold weather + 0-0 halftime score forced conservative approach limiting pass volume.

whatWentWrong.title: Critical Fumble Killed Momentum
whatWentWrong.description: Love fumbled (Dean forced, Phillips recovered) right before halftime when GB was in FG range. Momentum-killer prevented any offensive rhythm.

statisticalContext.percentileRanking: Bottom 10% of Love's season performances - worst game of year

postGameAnalysis.wasNormalVariance: This was 30% variance, 70% analytical error. While Phillips' 7-pressure debut was variance, the defensive nature of this MNF matchup (0-0 halftime, 10-7 final) was predictable given weather and Eagles' elite pass rush. Should have weighted potential for defensive slugfest more heavily. Love's 20 first-half yards and 4.9 YPA show complete offensive collapse. The 225.5 line assumed competitive scoring environment - didn't account for historically low-scoring affair.

closingLineValue.verdict: Slight positive CLV - line moved toward over but not enough to offset game script disaster.

keyTakeaways: Defensive primetime games kill QB yardage props - 0-0 halftime, 10-7 final destroyed pass volume
Jaelan Phillips' 7-pressure debut proved trade acquisitions can have immediate impact
20 first-half passing yards (2.2 YPA) shows complete offensive breakdown
Cold weather MNF games warrant extreme caution on QB passing overs
Missing by 49.5 yards (22% below line) reflects analytical failure, not just bad luck
verdict: Major analytical miss. While Love's season average (267.3 YPG) supported the over, the MNF defensive environment (Eagles' elite pass rush + frigid Lambeau weather) created perfect storm for under. Phillips' debut dominance (7 pressures) and 0-0 halftime score showed game script disaster from opening kickoff. Should have respected potential for defensive slugfest more heavily.
